articles.title: Life after death: Bill Nye says 'overwhelming evidence' proves there is no afterlife - Daily Express
articles.description: LIFE after death does not exist, at least according to science communicator Bill Nye the Science Guy who thinks there is 'overwhelming evidence' against the conventional idea of an afterlife.
